q1.question: How does automatic deployment work?
q1.answer: You provide your VPS IP and SSH credentials. Inopay installs Docker, configures PostgreSQL, provisions SSL, and deploys your app. Everything is automatic, no commands to type.

q2.question: Are my secrets safe? (Zero-Knowledge)
q2.answer: Your SSH credentials and API keys are used only during deployment and then deleted. We store no secrets after installation.

q3.question: How long does deployment take?
q3.answer: About 10 minutes: analysis, AI cleaning, VPS configuration, and going live. Your app is in production with SSL and database in under fifteen minutes.

q4.question: Which AI platforms are compatible?
q4.answer: Lovable, Bolt, v0, Cursor, Replit, and all platforms generating modern React/Vue/JavaScript code. AI cleaning adapts the code to your infrastructure.

howItWorks.question: How does Liberation work?
howItWorks.answer: You upload your project (ZIP or GitHub), our AI analyzes and removes proprietary dependencies, then we deploy the cleaned code to your VPS. The whole process takes about 10 minutes.

oneTime.question: Why a one-time payment instead of a subscription?
oneTime.answer: We believe your code belongs to you. Once liberated, it's yours forever. No monthly fees, no lock-in. Pay once, own your code.

packPro.question: What's included in the Pro Pack?
packPro.answer: The Pro Pack includes full Liberation ($99) + a dedicated configured VPS ($59) + 24/7 Monitoring for 1 year ($180). That's $217 of services for only $149, a $68 savings.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use a Zero-Knowledge architecture: your credentials are never stored. Cleaning happens in memory and everything is erased after deployment.

support.question: What support is included?
support.answer: Single Liberation includes priority support for 48h for the initial deployment. The Pro Pack includes unlimited priority support for the entire monitoring period (1 year).
